summary: Consume the Zammad API to interact with groups, organizations, tickets, and users.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the type of authentication to use (Basic Auth or Token Auth).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the Zammad resource to interact with (Group, Organization, Ticket, or User).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (Create, Delete, Get, Get Many, Update).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the group to create. Required for the 'Create' operation on the 'Group' resource.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the group to update, delete, or retrieve. Specify using an expression. Required for respective operations on the 'Group' resource.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a group, including 'Active' status and custom fields.
